name: circuit breaker (itch) (bideogame)
description:
Don’t let your microchip overload!

Your circuit will get power sent to it and it’s your job to drain it out before it blows your circuit. As power goes in end points will spawn and you must take control of a wire to connect it to all its end points. You can’t cross wires so plan out your path!

Controls

WASD to move your active line.

Tap in the direction you’re already travelling in to speed up your line.

Tap in the opposite direction to slow down.

R to restart.

Esc to quit.
